Initially, this can be supported by a locally based headhunting or HR development company. While Greenlanders in Denmark read Greenland newspapers, use internet and are informed about job opportunities, arrangement for providing additional information or making interviews in Denmark could be of advantage. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C2 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs 20% of local workers from the first 5 years of operation From the first 5 years of the operation phase estimated a workforce of approximately 20%local workers at ISUA, mainly for non-mining processing jobs during the first 5 years. operation Local community NA Medium Positive E6M9 Yes In order to improve the retention of local workforce, it is recommended to ensure the presence of Greenlandic speaking HR staff, and includes role counseling services to help the workers to develop personal and group strategies to solve interpersonal conflicts and overcome difficulties adapting to the working and life condition. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C2 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs 20% of local workers from the first 5 years of operation From the first 5 years of the operation phase estimated a workforce of approximately 20%local workers at ISUA, mainly for non-mining processing jobs during the first 5 years. operation Local community NA Medium Positive E6M10 Yes Set up a program for intercultural understanding, to be provided to all the workforce and contractors. The program could consist of, for example: i) a course to enhance the understanding of Greenlandic culture and communications codes, mandatory to all international staff, contractors and subcontractors to operate in Greenland; ii) introductory course on rules and expectations related to behaviour and communication during working hours; including explanation on why the rules are established as such iii) workforce workshops for elaboration of social rules during free time activities and common relaxation areas, etc. iv) regular events for encouraging intercultural dialogue and understanding. The program should include monitoring of internal communication or behavioural conflicts and good experiences, in order to ensure regular feedback and improvement of the program. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C3 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Local bussiness Local contractors/suppliers to be offered contract packages Specific contract packages (construction and services) to be offered to local contractors/suppliers on competitive basis. construction Local community NA Medium Positive E6M2 Yes Maintain regular contact with the Greenlandic Employers’ Associations, keeping them abreast of upcoming opportunities and discussing solutions and alternatives to potential challenges for the local companies to access business opportunities during the construction and operation phases. Within this forum, analyze and discuss the results of tender process and performance of local companies, providing constructive feedback to improve both access to business and the quality of services. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C4 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Local bussiness Business opportunities for local companies during the 15 years of operation Drilling, logistic support, field supervision, geological survey and other investigations, Construction of camps, site services and pre-stripping. Additional construction projects during the operations • Port operation components, Waste management during construction and operation, Air transport, Helicopter support, Demand for food and goods, particularly local meat and fish, Camp logistics and support services., Housing and accommodation in Nuuk, including taxi, restaurants, etc. construction Local community NA Medium Positive NA No NA NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

NA operation Local community NA Medium Positive E6M5 Yes Maintain regular contact with the Greenlandic Employers’ Associations, keeping them abreast of upcoming opportunities and discussing solutions and alternatives to potential challenges for the local companies to access business opportunities during the construction and operation phases. Within this forum, analyze and discuss the results of tender process and performance of local companies, providing constructive feedback to improve both access to business and the quality of services. NA operation Local community, industry NA Medium Negative NA No NA NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M1 Yes Strict enforcement of prohibition of all hunting activities for foreign staff, contractors and subcontractors involved in the project both within and outside working hours, during all phases of the project. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M2 Yes As per EIA, strict implementation of mitigation measures for preventing or reducing impact on caribou due to disturbances created by project activities during construction and operation, as well as potential barriers due to project Infrastructures. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M3 Yes In coordination with national authorities, establish exclusion areas during construction and operation, where hunting and fishing activities are not allowed due to safety and security reasons for the hunters, the staff and project Infrastructures. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M4 Yes As per EIA, establish a monitoring plan to register and study changes in the caribou population of the area. Moreover perform annual monitoring of hunting and other traditional livelihood activities in the project area, in collaboration with KNAPK. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M5 Yes Provide initial and regular information and explanations about the exclusion areas to the professional fishermen and hunters through their organization, KNAPK, as well as to recreational hunters through public media, meetings, pamphlets, etc. Coordinate with local authorities for reinforcing the information campaigns when licenses are renewed, etc. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M6 Yes During construction and operation, make formal agreements with local fishermen and hunters for the provision of fish and meat for the camps, directly or through the catering/canteen service. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M7 Yes Promote consumption and sales of locally produced food, handicrafts and seal skin products among international staff, providers and consultants. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M8 Yes Continue the presence of representatives of KNAPK in the consultation committee of the project. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M9 Yes As seal hunting is commonly a secondary activity of fishing, the amount of caught seals declared during the study may indicate that fishing activities with small boats is an activity more widespread and significant than originally expected. It is therefore recommended to perform a quantitative study and mapping of professional and recreational fishing in the waters along the Akia/Nordlandet area. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C10 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting close to construction areas and camps. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M10 Yes Annually cross check monitoring environmental information with impacts on performance and hunting/fishing areas for both professionals and recreational hunters. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C11 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Disturbance of caribou population, leading to local displacement of both caribou and habitual hunting areas. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M1 Yes Strict enforcement of prohibition of all hunting activities for foreign staff, contractors and subcontractors involved in the project both within and outside working hours, during all phases of the project. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C11 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Disturbance of caribou population, leading to local displacement of both caribou and habitual hunting areas. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M2 Yes As per EIA, strict implementation of mitigation measures for preventing or reducing impact on caribou due to disturbances created by project activities during construction and operation, as well as potential barriers due to project Infrastructures. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C11 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Disturbance of caribou population, leading to local displacement of both caribou and habitual hunting areas. NA construction Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M3 Yes In coordination with national authorities, establish exclusion areas during construction and operation, where hunting and fishing activities are not allowed due to safety and security reasons for the hunters, the staff and project Infrastructures. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M2 Yes As per EIA, strict implementation of mitigation measures for preventing or reducing impact on caribou due to disturbances created by project activities during construction and operation, as well as potential barriers due to project Infrastructures. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M3 Yes In coordination with national authorities, establish exclusion areas during construction and operation, where hunting and fishing activities are not allowed due to safety and security reasons for the hunters, the staff and project Infrastructures. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M4 Yes As per EIA, establish a monitoring plan to register and study changes in the caribou population of the area. Moreover perform annual monitoring of hunting and other traditional livelihood activities in the project area, in collaboration with KNAPK. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M5 Yes Provide initial and regular information and explanations about the exclusion areas to the professional fishermen and hunters through their organization, KNAPK, as well as to recreational hunters through public media, meetings, pamphlets, etc. Coordinate with local authorities for reinforcing the information campaigns when licenses are renewed, etc. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M6 Yes During construction and operation, make formal agreements with local fishermen and hunters for the provision of fish and meat for the camps, directly or through the catering/canteen service. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M7 Yes Promote consumption and sales of locally produced food, handicrafts and seal skin products among international staff, providers and consultants. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M8 Yes Continue the presence of representatives of KNAPK in the consultation committee of the project. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M9 Yes As seal hunting is commonly a secondary activity of fishing, the amount of caught seals declared during the study may indicate that fishing activities with small boats is an activity more widespread and significant than originally expected. It is therefore recommended to perform a quantitative study and mapping of professional and recreational fishing in the waters along the Akia/Nordlandet area. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C13 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Caribou displaced from habitual areas due to disturbance from project activities and Infrastructures NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M10 Yes Annually cross check monitoring environmental information with impacts on performance and hunting/fishing areas for both professionals and recreational hunters. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C14 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Prohibition of hunting in areas close to project Infrastructures for safety reasons. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M1 Yes Strict enforcement of prohibition of all hunting activities for foreign staff, contractors and subcontractors involved in the project both within and outside working hours, during all phases of the project. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C16 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Potential increase of time and resources required for caribou hunting activities. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M1 Yes Strict enforcement of prohibition of all hunting activities for foreign staff, contractors and subcontractors involved in the project both within and outside working hours, during all phases of the project. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C16 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Potential increase of time and resources required for caribou hunting activities. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M2 Yes As per EIA, strict implementation of mitigation measures for preventing or reducing impact on caribou due to disturbances created by project activities during construction and operation, as well as potential barriers due to project Infrastructures. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C16 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Potential increase of time and resources required for caribou hunting activities. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M3 Yes In coordination with national authorities, establish exclusion areas during construction and operation, where hunting and fishing activities are not allowed due to safety and security reasons for the hunters, the staff and project Infrastructures. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C16 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Potential increase of time and resources required for caribou hunting activities. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M4 Yes As per EIA, establish a monitoring plan to register and study changes in the caribou population of the area. Moreover perform annual monitoring of hunting and other traditional livelihood activities in the project area, in collaboration with KNAPK. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C16 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Potential increase of time and resources required for caribou hunting activities. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M5 Yes Provide initial and regular information and explanations about the exclusion areas to the professional fishermen and hunters through their organization, KNAPK, as well as to recreational hunters through public media, meetings, pamphlets, etc. Coordinate with local authorities for reinforcing the information campaigns when licenses are renewed, etc. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C16 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Potential increase of time and resources required for caribou hunting activities. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M6 Yes During construction and operation, make formal agreements with local fishermen and hunters for the provision of fish and meat for the camps, directly or through the catering/canteen service. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C16 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Potential increase of time and resources required for caribou hunting activities. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M7 Yes Promote consumption and sales of locally produced food, handicrafts and seal skin products among international staff, providers and consultants. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M8 Yes Continue the presence of representatives of KNAPK in the consultation committee of the project. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C16 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Traditional livelihoods Potential increase of time and resources required for caribou hunting activities. NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M9 Yes As seal hunting is commonly a secondary activity of fishing, the amount of caught seals declared during the study may indicate that fishing activities with small boats is an activity more widespread and significant than originally expected. It is therefore recommended to perform a quantitative study and mapping of professional and recreational fishing in the waters along the Akia/Nordlandet area. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

NA operation Local community, wildlife NA Low Negative E6M10 Yes Annually cross check monitoring environmental information with impacts on performance and hunting/fishing areas for both professionals and recreational hunters. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C17 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Education Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers. NA operation Local community NA High Positive E6M1 Yes Undertake an assessment of training needs and base on this and the detailed job description, prepare a job training program for the required job categories NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C17 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Education Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers. NA operation Local community NA High Positive E6M2 Yes Actively promote training in English language, for both potential workers as well as for improving the communication skills of local workers, for example offering courses to be taken during their weeks off or after work hours on the site. NA operation Local community NA High Positive E6M3 Yes Involve the School of Minerals and Petroleum in the training and recruitment program. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C17 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Education Increased specific capacity for working in the extractive industry for local workers. NA operation Local community NA High Positive E6M4 Yes Discuss with the School of Minerals and Petroleum and ARTEK the possibility of adapting the curricula of the basic training courses and the development advanced courses in order to match the needs of ISUA project and other highly mechanised mining operations, and thereby improve employment prospects of new graduates. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

NA operation Local community NA High Positive E6M5 Yes Discuss with the School of Minerals and Petroleum and ARTEK, INULI and Navigational School the possibility of allocating a number of job positions as apprenticeship positions for advanced students. NA operation Local community NA High Positive E6M7 Yes Dedicated, locally based Greenlandic speaking Human Resources Manager to develop and follow up on recruitment, training and career development of the staff. NA operation Local community NA High Positive E6M8 Yes Regular evaluation of progress on the training programs and performance of apprentices and local and international staff, in order to continuously optimize the internal training programs and provide feedback to educational institutions. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C19 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Other Increased administrative focus on relevant training and local employment opportunities in the mining sector NA operation Local community NA High Positive E6M4 Yes Discuss with the School of Minerals and Petroleum and ARTEK the possibility of adapting the curricula of the basic training courses and the development advanced courses in order to match the needs of ISUA project and other highly mechanised mining operations, and thereby improve employment prospects of new graduates. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C20 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Municipal services Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M1 Yes Local and national plans and programmes NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C20 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Municipal services Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M2 Yes Establish cooperation with Sermersooq Municipality as soon as possible, in order to clarify the following aspects: • Estimation of housing demand for the project during construction and operation • Alternative plans for short term and long term housing for staff and their families in Nuuk • Project needs related to treatment and final disposition of certain types of wastes, and solutions acceptable for the Municipality • Plan for use of port facilities and dock space in the port of Nuuk. • ISUA Project plan for submission of request for construction permits, so the Municipality can better organize its work. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C20 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Municipal services Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M3 Yes Avoid in all cases municipal housing and use private rental NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C20 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Municipal services Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M4 Yes For short term accommodation in Nuuk consider a framework contract with the local hotels and temporary rented accommodation facilities where expected services and approximated time plan will be specified NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C20 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Municipal services Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M5 Yes Assess the type and quantity of waste potentially produced and consider alternative waste treatment solutions. Minimize shipping of domestic wastes for treatment to the facilities in Nuuk during construction. Promote development of new and innovative waste recycling/reuse local business. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C20 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Municipal services Pressure on administration of municipal permits for the construction phase NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M6 Yes Transboundary transport of hazardous waste may create additional unwanted risks. It is suggested that, in coordination with the Municipality, joint efforts are made in cooperation with other mining and oil projects in order to co-finance the upgrading of the waste treatment facility in Nuuk to handle hazardous wastes. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M2 Yes Establish cooperation with Sermersooq Municipality as soon as possible, in order to clarify the following aspects: • Estimation of housing demand for the project during construction and operation • Alternative plans for short term and long term housing for staff and their families in Nuuk • Project needs related to treatment and final disposition of certain types of wastes, and solutions acceptable for the Municipality • Plan for use of port facilities and dock space in the port of Nuuk. • ISUA Project plan for submission of request for construction permits, so the Municipality can better organize its work. NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M4 Yes For short term accommodation in Nuuk consider a framework contract with the local hotels and temporary rented accommodation facilities where expected services and approximated time plan will be specified NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C22 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Waste Overload of waste management services in Nuuk between 2012- 2015. NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M5 Yes Assess the type and quantity of waste potentially produced and consider alternative waste treatment solutions. Minimize shipping of domestic wastes for treatment to the facilities in Nuuk during construction. Promote development of new and innovative waste recycling/reuse local business. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C22 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Waste Overload of waste management services in Nuuk between 2012- 2015. NA construction Local community NA Medium Negative E6M6 Yes Transboundary transport of hazardous waste may create additional unwanted risks. It is suggested that, in coordination with the Municipality, joint efforts are made in cooperation with other mining and oil projects in order to co-finance the upgrading of the waste treatment facility in Nuuk to handle hazardous wastes. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C24 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Other services The needs of the project will have implications on key aspects of the local provision of services and development in Sermersooq Municipality, in particular on: • Housing • Air traffic in Nuuk Airport • Maritime freight traffic, both directly and indirectly related to the project • Treatment of hazardous and special fractions of waste NA operation Local community NA Medium Negative E6M1 Yes Local and national plans and programmes NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C24 5-Societies 5C-Service & infrastructure 5C-Other services The needs of the project will have implications on key aspects of the local provision of services and development in Sermersooq Municipality, in particular on: • Housing • Air traffic in Nuuk Airport • Maritime freight traffic, both directly and indirectly related to the project • Treatment of hazardous and special fractions of waste NA operation Local community NA Medium Negative E6M2 Yes Establish cooperation with Sermersooq Municipality as soon as possible, in order to clarify the following aspects: • Estimation of housing demand for the project during construction and operation • Alternative plans for short term and long term housing for staff and their families in Nuuk • Project needs related to treatment and final disposition of certain types of wastes, and solutions acceptable for the Municipality • Plan for use of port facilities and dock space in the port of Nuuk. • ISUA Project plan for submission of request for construction permits, so the Municipality can better organize its work. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

It is suggested that, in coordination with the Municipality, joint efforts are made in cooperation with other mining and oil projects in order to co-finance the upgrading of the waste treatment facility in Nuuk to handle hazardous wastes. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C25 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M1 Yes Monitoring of the demographic changes taking place in Nuuk, e.g. the number and profile of international staff locating in Nuuk , number of Greenlandic immigrants, both workers and their families.. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C25 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M2 Yes Implementation of a Grievance Mechanism for the project, according to IMF standards and best practices of the mining industry, to be operational from beginning of the construction phase. Citizens should be able to express verbal or written complaints in Greenlandic, Danish or English related to grievances caused by or related to project activities, the project staff, its consultants or contractors. Procedures for reporting the complaint should be widely communicated. Duration of the resolution process and how disagreements will be resolved must be clearly explained. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C25 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M3 Yes A Grievance mechanism will help in the identification of social conflicts that were not predicted or expected, as well as prevent conflicts from escalating by providing speedy and acceptable resolutions. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C25 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M4 Yes Monitoring of workers actually visiting Nuuk during their days off and the percentage of workers that extend their stay in Greenland beyond the construction period needs to be monitored in coordination with the Greenland authorities to fully assess the real impact. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C25 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M5 Yes It is recommended that measures are taken to prevent risks stemming from the high number of international workers during construction, including facilitation of access to Nuuk, awareness raising activities related to sexual behaviour and understanding of the Greenlandic culture and way of life. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C25 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M6 Yes It is not expected that a significant number of construction workers will choose to spend their one free day per week in Nuuk. Nevertheless, if this proves otherwise, measures should be taken to regulate the amount of workers in town simultaneously. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C25 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Jobs Approximately 1000 to 3000 temporary international workers, mostly male, expected for a period of 3 years NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M7 Yes Awareness raising and team building activities should be planned at the camp with the intention of creating intercultural understanding and respect among workers of different nationalities including providing international staff with a basic understanding of Greenlandic culture, etiquette and basic vocabulary. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C27 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of unwanted pregnancies and aborts NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M3 Yes A Grievance mechanism will help in the identification of social conflicts that were not predicted or expected, as well as prevent conflicts from escalating by providing speedy and acceptable resolutions. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C27 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of unwanted pregnancies and aborts NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M4 Yes Monitoring of workers actually visiting Nuuk during their days off and the percentage of workers that extend their stay in Greenland beyond the construction period needs to be monitored in coordination with the Greenland authorities to fully assess the real impact. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C27 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of unwanted pregnancies and aborts NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M5 Yes It is recommended that measures are taken to prevent risks stemming from the high number of international workers during construction, including facilitation of access to Nuuk, awareness raising activities related to sexual behaviour and understanding of the Greenlandic culture and way of life. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C27 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of unwanted pregnancies and aborts NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M6 Yes It is not expected that a significant number of construction workers will choose to spend their one free day per week in Nuuk. Nevertheless, if this proves otherwise, measures should be taken to regulate the amount of workers in town simultaneously. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C27 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of unwanted pregnancies and aborts NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M7 Yes Awareness raising and team building activities should be planned at the camp with the intention of creating intercultural understanding and respect among workers of different nationalities including providing international staff with a basic understanding of Greenlandic culture, etiquette and basic vocabulary. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C27 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of unwanted pregnancies and aborts NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M8 Yes Furthermore, contracts with suppliers should reflect measures for the prevention of risks for social conflict. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C28 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of sale of illegal drugs. NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M1 Yes Monitoring of the demographic changes taking place in Nuuk, e.g. the number and profile of international staff locating in Nuuk , number of Greenlandic immigrants, both workers and their families.. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C28 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of sale of illegal drugs. NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M2 Yes Implementation of a Grievance Mechanism for the project, according to IMF standards and best practices of the mining industry, to be operational from beginning of the construction phase. Citizens should be able to express verbal or written complaints in Greenlandic, Danish or English related to grievances caused by or related to project activities, the project staff, its consultants or contractors. Procedures for reporting the complaint should be widely communicated. Duration of the resolution process and how disagreements will be resolved must be clearly explained. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C28 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of sale of illegal drugs. NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M3 Yes A Grievance mechanism will help in the identification of social conflicts that were not predicted or expected, as well as prevent conflicts from escalating by providing speedy and acceptable resolutions. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C28 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of sale of illegal drugs. NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M4 Yes Monitoring of workers actually visiting Nuuk during their days off and the percentage of workers that extend their stay in Greenland beyond the construction period needs to be monitored in coordination with the Greenland authorities to fully assess the real impact. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M5 Yes It is recommended that measures are taken to prevent risks stemming from the high number of international workers during construction, including facilitation of access to Nuuk, awareness raising activities related to sexual behaviour and understanding of the Greenlandic culture and way of life. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C28 5-Societies 5E-Health/wellbeing 5E-Health/safety Risk of increase of sale of illegal drugs. NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M6 Yes It is not expected that a significant number of construction workers will choose to spend their one free day per week in Nuuk. Nevertheless, if this proves otherwise, measures should be taken to regulate the amount of workers in town simultaneously. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M7 Yes Awareness raising and team building activities should be planned at the camp with the intention of creating intercultural understanding and respect among workers of different nationalities including providing international staff with a basic understanding of Greenlandic culture, etiquette and basic vocabulary. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf

NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M8 Yes Furthermore, contracts with suppliers should reflect measures for the prevention of risks for social conflict. NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M1 Yes Monitoring of the demographic changes taking place in Nuuk, e.g. the number and profile of international staff locating in Nuuk , number of Greenlandic immigrants, both workers and their families.. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C30 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Other Potential extension of resident or working permits from temporary workers and later their families NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M2 Yes Implementation of a Grievance Mechanism for the project, according to IMF standards and best practices of the mining industry, to be operational from beginning of the construction phase. Citizens should be able to express verbal or written complaints in Greenlandic, Danish or English related to grievances caused by or related to project activities, the project staff, its consultants or contractors. Procedures for reporting the complaint should be widely communicated. Duration of the resolution process and how disagreements will be resolved must be clearly explained. ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C30 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Other Potential extension of resident or working permits from temporary workers and later their families NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M7 Yes Awareness raising and team building activities should be planned at the camp with the intention of creating intercultural understanding and respect among workers of different nationalities including providing international staff with a basic understanding of Greenlandic culture, etiquette and basic vocabulary. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C30 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Other Potential extension of resident or working permits from temporary workers and later their families NA construction Local community NA Low/Medium Negative E6M8 Yes Furthermore, contracts with suppliers should reflect measures for the prevention of risks for social conflict. NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C31 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Migration Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders. NA operation Local community NA Medium Positive E6M1 Yes National social and public health prevention program Paarisa NAGrontmij A/S (2013) Social Impact Assessment for the ISUA Iron Ore Project for London Mining Greenland A/S. https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf 2013 https://naalakkersuisut.gl/~/media/Nanoq/Files/Attached%20Files/Raastof/Hoeringer/ISUA%202012/SIA%20London%20Mining%20final%20march%202013.pdf
ISUA Iron Ore Open pit Iron Greenland Nuuk 150 km NW of Nuuk 65.50312849 -50.33983198 E6C31 5-Societies 5B-Economic 5B-Migration Expected reduction on emigration of Greenlanders. NA operation Local community NA Medium Positive E6M2 Yes Monitoring of the demographic changes taking place in Nuuk, e.g. the number and profile of international staff locating in Nuuk , number of Greenlandic immigrants, both workers and their families..
